holidays.title: World Environment Day
holidays.description: World Environment Day is both a global celebration and a platform for public outreach.

holidays.title: Constitution Day
holidays.description: Let’s take a trip down memory lane in the constitutional history of Denmark.

holidays.title: Holy Spirit Monday
holidays.description: Today, the faithful celebrate the descension of the Holy Spirit.

holidays.title: Hot Air Balloon Day
holidays.description: Get ready to float above the Earth and admire the view from greater heights.

holidays.title: International Day for the Fight against Illegal Unreported and Unregulated Fishing
holidays.description: It’s time to pull up your sleeves and join the fight against illegal fishing.

holidays.title: International Day for the Fight against Illegal, Unreported and Unregulated Fishing
holidays.description: This day also attempts to promote local biodiversity as well as food security.

holidays.title: June Bank Holiday
holidays.description: Summer is in the air and you have a full day to celebrate this national holiday.

holidays.title: Khordad National Uprising in Iran
holidays.description: Learn about the events that led to the birth of the Islamic Republic of Iran.

holidays.title: National Gingerbread Day
holidays.description: Share in the gingerbread love with our fun recipes and tips to celebrate.

holidays.title: National Janet Day
holidays.description: Today is a great day to celebrate all of the Janets that you know!

holidays.title: National Jenny Day
holidays.description: The name is just perfect, short, to the point, with a lot of personal warmth.

holidays.title: National Joyce Day
holidays.description: Everyone with the name Joyce — get on social media and celebrate your name!

holidays.title: National Lincoln Loud Day
holidays.description: Happy National Lincoln Loud Day! Don't miss the big celebration this holiday.

holidays.title: National Veggie Burger Day
holidays.description: This day celebrates the veggie burger and its positive impact on the environment.

holidays.title: Orthodox Pentecost Monday
holidays.description: Today is the day to prepare a lavish feast to honor the Holy Spirit.

holidays.title: President's Day in Equatorial Guinea
holidays.description: Let’s take a trip to Guinea and greet the president this President’s Day!

holidays.title: Sausage Roll Day
holidays.description: From a mixture of chopped meat and seasoning, stuffed in delicious casings, comes flavorful sausage rolls.

holidays.title: Thank You Day
holidays.description: It’s a day of gratitude and appreciation for the unsung heroes in our communities.

holidays.title: The Yang di-Pertuan Agong's Birthday
holidays.description: Dive into the history of Malaysian royalty, the only one of its kind in the world.

holidays.title: Western Australia Day
holidays.description: Originally called "Foundation Day," it has since been renamed to include all Western Australians.

holidays.title: Brandon Farris’s Birthday
holidays.description: Brandon Farris is a content creator who found success on Facebook in 2015.

holidays.title: Ceaser Emanuel’s Birthday
holidays.description: With over 2.3 million Instagram followers, this artist has captured the hearts of millions.

holidays.title: Colt Johnson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This software engineer and reality T.V. star has proved that he’s multitalented.

holidays.title: Mark Wahlberg’s Birthday
holidays.description: This brilliant actor overcame many obstacles in his life to become a global superstar.

holidays.title: Ninja’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this successful streamer, who has made millions with his gaming talent.

holidays.title: Pancho Villa’s Birthday
holidays.description: Pancho Villa started out as a bandit, occasionally stealing cattle but later became a war hero.

holidays.title: Robert Kraft’s Birthday
holidays.description: This extremely smart businessman deserves all the accolades and recognition he receives!
